column5: Got out for 3 hours tonight. About a dozen perch of which the biggest was 0.92 pounds and about 5 bass.  Biggest was over 4 pounds.  Beautiful temperature.  Only caught about 12 perch because I was strictly fishing for smallies. Pic of nice bass and perch
Nice fish.Good to see someone is catching big perch. We got skunked on Francis perchin.
Nice job that's a nice perch and a nice smallie.
Looked like a great night!  Can't complain about targeting bass and catching huge perch like that!
